Title: Advance victoriously while following Chairman Mao's revolutionary line in literature and the arts
Designer: Central Academy of Industrial Art and Design (中央工艺美术学院)
Notes: At the height of the Mao worship, Mao appears as radiant sun, high above the masses. The dancing figures are from the revolutionary model operas developed by Mao's wife Jiang Qing. A group on the right is holding the famous poster "Chairman Mao goes to Anyuan".
